page.title: 14The R.N.A.S. Swimming Pool
page.content: On a Saturday I go to the swimming baths at the{R.N.A.S.}It is a{heated {open-air pool}which is open from 10a.m-5p.m. It hasn't got a diving board but we play polo a lot. You can also join{coaching classes}to improve your swimming. To get there from Ilchester you have to walk or cycle as it is one and a half miles away. You also need a pass to get in.People who work on the Base can get in free because it was originally built for them but other people have to pay to go in. At the side of the pool there is an ice-cream shop and a second shop called the{Heron Club}which sells crisps,sweets,chocolate and canned drinks. My swimming session usually ends with a visit to one of these two shops!
